title: Chapter III - DESIGNATION AND CLASSIFICATION OF INSTITUTIONS AND COMMITMENT TO THE DEPARTMENT
content:
Chapter III - DESIGNATION AND CLASSIFICATION OF INSTITUTIONS AND COMMITMENT TO THE DEPARTMENT
State Regulations

Part 100 - DESIGNATION AND CLASSIFICATION OF CORRECTIONAL FACILITIES (§ 100.1 to 100.131)

Part 101 - Repealed

Part 102 - Repealed

Part 103 - Orders Designating Institutions To Which Persons Committed To Custody Of The State Department Of Correctional Services Are To Be Delivered (§ 103.1 to 103.50)

Part 104 - Orders Designating Institutions To Which Persons Returned To Institutions Under Jurisdiction Of State Department Of Correctional Services For Violation Of Parole Or Conditional Or Other Release Are To Be Delivered (§ 104.1 to 104.3)

Part 105 - DESIGNATION AND CLASSIFICATION OF DRUG TREATMENT CAMPUSES (REPEALED) (§ 105.1)

Part 110 - Interpretation Of Age Range Provisions (§ 110.1)

Part 120 - Repealed

Part 130 - Transfer Of Foreign Nationals (§ 130.1 to 130.2)

Part 150 - Repealed

Part 155 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
